data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Južno-Banatski to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Južno-Banatski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Južno-Banatski, Serbia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Južno-Banatski, Serbia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Južno-Banatski to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, I pray that all the Gorani people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Gorani people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Gorani people is yours.
Jesus, please help the 13,032 believers in the state of Južno-Banatski to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Južno-Banatski, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 13,032 believers in Južno-Banatski, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.
